scripts.preinstall: (node -e "process.exit(process.platform === 'win32' ? 0 : 1)") && ((edenfsctl info . && eden redirect add $npm_package_config_repo_path/node_modules symlink) || echo no eden found) || ((edenfsctl info . && eden redirect add $npm_package_config_repo_path/node_modules bind) || echo no eden found)
